For what reason does the Bodhisattva emerge from his mother's right side with right mindfulness, not from other parts of the body?

The Bodhisattva's pure conduct is the most revered and supreme in the trichiliocosm. He does not rely on the female organ to abide or emerge. This is a one-life Bodhisattva demonstrating this, not other pure practitioners. Therefore, the Bodhisattva emerges from the right side of the body.
